cms.query.QueryText: SELECT Forums_ForumRoles.ForumID, Forums_ForumRoles.RoleID, Forums_ForumRoles.PermissionID, CMS_Permission.PermissionName FROM Forums_ForumRoles INNER JOIN CMS_Permission ON CMS_Permission.PermissionID = Forums_ForumRoles.PermissionID WHERE (Forums_ForumRoles.ForumID = @ForumID) AND ((Forums_ForumRoles.RoleID IN (SELECT RoleID FROM View_CMS_UserRoleMembershipRole AS Roles WHERE (Roles.SiteID = @SiteID OR Roles.SiteID IS NULL) AND Roles.UserID = @UserID AND (Roles.ValidTo IS NULL OR Roles.ValidTo > @Now) )) OR (Forums_ForumRoles.RoleID IN (SELECT CMS_Role.RoleID FROM CMS_Role WHERE RoleName IN (##GENERICROLES##) AND CMS_Role.SiteID=@SiteID)))
